#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
    ll test,n,e,x,y; scanf("%lld",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
      scanf("%lld",&n);
      vector < vector<ll> > v (n);
      scanf("%lld",&e);
      while(e--)
      {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
        v[x].push_back(y);
        v[y].push_back(x);
      }

      vector<bool> visited (n,false);
      ll component=0;
      for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
              {
                          if(!visited[i])
                          {
                            component+=1;
                            stack<ll> s;
                            s.push(i);
                            while(!s.empty())
                                {   ll k=s.top();
                                    visited[k]=true;
                                    s.pop();
                                    for(std::vector<ll>::iterator it=v[k].begin(); it<v[k].end();it++)
                                          if(!visited[*it])
                                              s.push(*it);
                                }
                          }
               }
               cout<<component<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
